articles.title: We Asked Audio Pros to Blind Test Headphones. The Results Were Surprising - WIRED
articles.description: When it comes to choosing a good pair of headphones, what happens when you take features, design, and brand awareness out of the equation, and leave it all up to the sound?

articles.title: Sony Details Ghost of Yotei Day-One Patch Notes — Includes an Extensive List of Improvements - IGN
articles.description: PlayStation 5 exclusive Ghost of Yotei has a day-one patch that adds a number of important features to the game. Sony has provided IGN with the patch notes.

articles.title: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE interview with Director Naoki Hamaguchi - Square Enix
articles.description: Welcome to the official SQUARE ENIX website. Find all the latest news and updates about your favourite games and upcoming releases.

articles.title: ‘Dumbphones’ are getting smarter, more costly and offering options for disillusioned consumers - CNN
articles.description: The feature phone market is contracting, but a healthy marketplace for premium models is catering to people who want to make the change with fewer compromises.

articles.title: Opera launches its AI-centric Neon browser - TechCrunch
articles.description: Neon will write code snippets, includes an agent that will do tasks for you, and handles repeatable prompts.

articles.title: Logitech’s MX Master 4 adds haptics to everyday mousing around - The Verge
articles.description: Logitech has announced the haptics-equipped MX Master 4 wireless mouse. It’ll be available in multiple colors for $119.99 starting in October.
